title: A liquid metal-embedded 3D interconnected-porous TPU/MXene composite with improved capacitive sensitivity and pressure detection range
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15730-15741
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01215A, Paper
Open Access

Zhong Zheng, Xing Fang, Yifan Pan, Shuyi Song, Huan Xue, Jun Li, Yi Li, Jing Li
We embed the LM in the internally interconnected porous structure of flexible foam, in which the LM endows the as-fabricated capacitive sensor with outstanding pressure sensitivity.
